parameters: Howdy.\. I'm the caretaker of the mountain and the manager
of the campsite.\. What can I do for you?\! If you're looking
for a place to stay for the night,\. I'm afraid this house
is booked.\. That green-haired boy got here before you.
There are a few tents at the campsite you can stay in.\.
Free of charge for now.\. Very few people have been
camping at the mountain ever since the giant ant
Nasty pests.\. I wish I could get rid of every single
Oh well. If you have any more questions for me, I'll
Howdy again.\. What can I do for you?
We used to get a lot of visitors on the mountain. Lots of
folks enjoy hiking all the way to the top, but I haven't
seen many hikers as of late.
I've got a secret tunnel to the top so I can easily do
maintenance. If you plan on wanting to visit the peak a
lot, I'll let you use it. Pull the lever over there
The campsite is free for anyone to use. I used to be
charging fees, but business is not, in fact, booming,
so I'm giving campers the opportunity to camp free of
Some campers even dare to try and camp on the mountain, but
ever since all those giant ants set up shop, its been
In fact, we don't get many customers at all anymore. No
Me? I live here. In this little house next to the mountain.
Caring for the mountain and managing the campsite at the
same time isn't easy, but it means a lot to me.
I'm kinda concerned for the future of the business though.\.
We need some kinda big event to boost interest\.. Something
legendary\..\..\..but I doubt that'll ever happen.
Howdy.\. I'm the caretaker of the mountain and the manager
of the campsite.\. The campsite is to the east if you
plan on camping. \.Free of charge for now.
Very few people have been camping at the mountain ever
since the giant ant infestation.\. Nasty pests.\. I wish I
could get rid of every single one of them somehow.
Oh well.\. If you have any more questions for me, I'll

Caring for the mountain and managing the campsite at the
same time isn't easy, but it means a lot to me.
I'm kinda concerned for the future of the business though.\.
We need some kinda big event to boost interest\.. Something
legendary\..\..\..but I doubt that'll ever happen.
The ant situation on the mountain is getting worse every
day.\. I need some way to just wipe them all out somehow.\.
Maybe then the mountain would attract more tourists
If only someone nearby had some sort of super strength
pest control on their person and would be generous
"Industrial Strength," you say?\. That gives me an idea.\.
I'll fumigate the mountain and eradicate those nasty bugs!\.
My dear friend,\. you may have just saved my business!
I can't thank you enough.\. Sadly,\. I don't have much
to offer you in return.\! But here!\. A little treat
Honestly?\. It's like nobody has ever seen
FOR PETE'S SAKE!\. I'M A KANGAROO!!!
Kangaroo?\. Never heard of that breed.
Howdy again.\. What can I do for you?
We used to get a lot of visitors on the mountain. Lots of
folks enjoy hiking all the way to the top, but I haven't
seen many hikers as of late.

Me? I live here. In this little house next to the mountain.
Caring for the mountain and managing the campsite at the
same time isn't easy, but it means a lot to me.
I'm kinda concerned for the future of the business though.\.
We need some kinda big event to boost interest\.. Something
legendary\..\..\..but I doubt that'll ever happen.
Oh, don't you worry about that.\. I'll take care of them
in due time.\. They're going to regret ever making an
anthill out of my mountain, I can tell you that!
Oh! Hey there! My name is Horace.
Oh. Sorry if that was too sudden of me. You
You just reminded me of a friend I know.
In fact, the reason I came all the way here
is because I was searching for my friend.\.
Did you come down from the mountain? And if
so, did you happen to see my friend, \N[9]?
Really? I knew it! I'll go and see them first
Oh\..\..\..I thought for sure they would be
here.\. I might look around the mountain
tomorrow anyway just to make sure.
spot for self-reflection. I don't know why.
